Title: Incendies
Writer: Denis Villeneuve (scenario), Wajdi Mouawad (play), Valérie Beaugrand-Champagne (collaboration), Denis Villeneuve (dialogue)
Actors: Mustafa Kamel, Hussein Sami, Rémy Girard, Mélissa Désormeaux-Poulin
Plot: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 39 wins & 16 nominations.
